channel.title: Breakfast on The Recipe Book
channel.description: Recent content in Breakfast on The Recipe Book

item.title: Keto Breakfast Egg Bites
item.description: Recipe makes close to 12 egg bites depending on what size eggs you use, you can easily double or triple the recipe, to make more or less… INGREDIENTS: 10 eggs 1 cup of any cheese you would like. 1/2 cup full fat cottage cheese 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt Couple cracks of fresh black pepper As much bacon as you want Non-stick spray I like canola oil INSTRUCTIONS: Pre-heat oven to 300 F degrees and place a baking dish that is filled with some water on the bottom rack.
